name: Prime Orchid A teddy bear's Heist
name_original: Prime Orchid A teddy bear's Heist
description:
One Bear's dream is another bears heist.

Look in on the story of a young bear as they steal a flower for a beloved family member.

Is everything going to be as it seems or is it all a massive mistake? 

Inspiration from the magic realism bot quote "In Dublin there is an orchid which has petals in the shape of prime numbers".
